items.name: Super Box
items.desc: Do you want to test your reaction? Super Box is such an arcade game can make you react faster. You need to tap the right color to make the block jump

items.name: Rotare
items.desc: Rotare is an interesting html5 game which needs your reaction. You need to click your mouse or tap screen quickly when you need to turn your direction.

items.name: Mortar Watermelon
items.desc: If you have played angry bird,you will interested in this game Mortar Watermelon.

items.name: Magic Cube
items.desc: Do you want to try our new puzzle game Magic Cube? The goal of the game is to make the frog collect the stars in different cubes, you need to help the frog jump to the star.

items.name: Lost Kitty Go Home
items.desc: This cute kitty was lost in this forest, can you help him get back home? Move boxes over obstacles to make safe path.

items.name: Monster Adventure
items.desc: This little monster goes to another world to take an adventure. He is excited and anxious.

items.name: Speedlust Driver
items.desc: Speedlust Driver is a car racing game. First, you need to assemble your car,then select races from world map

items.name: Strike Squad
items.desc: Strike Squad is a html5 shoot defense game. In this game you need to reload your weapon and get ready to shoot some enemies

items.name: Gravity Ball
items.desc: A ball without gravity is amazing, it can both run upon the road and under the road.

items.name: Guns and Blocks
items.desc: Guns and Blocks is an HTML5 Arcade Game. Control your ship and break as many blocks as you can. You need to shoot the times

items.name: Speedy Boat
items.desc: Do you like the sea? So you like driving a boat and drifting on the sea?

items.name: Jewel Hunt
items.desc: Jewel Hunt is a beautiful matching game. Your goal in this game is switch and match 3 or more jewels to complete a level and unlock the next level!

items.name: trezeSNWboard
items.desc: What an exciting online skiing game! In this game you need to be careful of the hawks,and jump to avoid the stumps!

items.name: 2Cars Adventure
items.desc: 2Cars Adventure is a simple car driving game which can test your reaction.

items.name: Burger Now
items.desc: Do you like eating burgers? Burger Now is an addicting management game,you need to make the right burgers for your customers.

items.name: Steam Trucker
items.desc: Steam Trucker is a truck deliver game. Your job in this game deliver your cargo to the end point and collect all 5 stars.

items.name: Finger Driver Online
items.desc: Do you want to become the king of drift? In this game you can do that! This is a high-skilled car driving game

items.name: Pocket Jump
items.desc: Pocket Jump is a fast-paced,high score game,in this game you need to help this cute block jump to higher place
